title: 163 - Gay Christians, Sexual Identity, and the Church - with Nate Collins
description: Nate Collins, the founder of Revoice, a movement of non-straight Christians who hold to traditional views of marriage and sexuality, joins us for a fascinating discussion about a different way to frame discussions around sexuality.
dc:creator: Voxology
itunes:summary: Nate Collins, the founder of Revoice, a movement of non-straight Christians who hold to traditional views of marriage and sexuality, joins us for a fascinating discussion about a different way to frame discussions around sexuality.
